title: BlackCAT Alert
description: Generate alerts from the detection of soft X-ray transients.

follow_up_event.description: Name or trigger time of the external trigger that launched the search.

follow_up_type.description: Type of external trigger that launched the search, eg GW, GRB, etc.

known_source.description: Name of a known source that this event has been associated to.

association_probability.description: A score of known source association probability from poorly associated (0) to confidently associated (1)

image_peak_value.description: Peak value of the source [image units]

source_offset_ra.description: RA angle of the offset between the detected source and catalogued position [arcsec]

source_offset_dec.description: DEC angle of the offset between the detected source and catalogued position [arcsec]

light_curve_url.description: URL of the quicklook light curve plot
